item.description: Doctor Who episode "Blink" followed by Timey Wimey of Doctor Who (BBC Special). Please arrive at 8pm (not earlier please). Light snacks, BYOB (alcohol ok if you are 21+). This event is hosted by Niki and Joe at their abode in south part of Amherst. It is pretty easy to get to by car and there is also a PVTA bus stop right in front of their apartment. Note it is apartment i (as in igloo), not the number 1.
item.name: Timey Wimey of Doctor Who and the episode "Blink"
